name: Figura 44
description:
“Figury” (eng. Figures) is a series of generative artworks combining curves and grids into more complicated shapes, that create rich, suprising compositions. Each figure is also a drawing, plotted with AxiDraw A3 pen plotter.

Purchase of this piece comes with getting a physical drawing. International shipping included.

Upon resale on the secondary market the physical drawing shall be sent to the new owner. Shipping will be covered by the new owner.

Creation date: 21.04.2021

Plotted with:
Pigma Micron 01 on A3 bristol board
